description: Chlorine is a reactive greenish-yellow gas widely used for disinfection, chemical production, and water treatment. Its strong oxidizing properties help eliminate harmful microorganisms. In industry, chlorine is key to manufacturing plastics, solvents, and pharmaceuticals. Although toxic in high concentrations, chlorine compounds such as chlorides are stable and vital to biological function. Careful handling ensures chlorine’s benefits can be used safely and effectively.
name: Chlorine
